Text: Thanks so much for uploading this. If I could afford it, I would absolutely buy this book. A more worthy use of money could not be found.  But I can't, so I'm really glad I still get to read it.

A couple of notes that might be helpful to others:

1) "Epub" is a type of file that is for Kindle e-book readers (and I assume other e-book readers, too).

2) You can convert any "pdf" file to "epub" or "epub" to "pdf" by using the free program Calibre.
will d/l this for my iPad and buying the physical copy to share with others. Incredible story.
